short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy and secure access to .ton sites from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Miniature browser extension, allows you to access sites on the .ton network.
All you have to do is install an extension in your browser and the TON-Sites will be available for you to visit.
